meanings.definition: The act of beginning or starting something.
meanings.sent1: The ginnings of a race are always filled with excitement.
meanings.sent2: She was nervous at the ginnings of her new job.
meanings.sent3: The ginnings of a friendship can be awkward but fun.
meanings.sent4: In the ginnings of a story, the characters are introduced.
meanings.sent5: The ginnings of a journey are often the most memorable.

meanings.definition: The first part or stage of something.
meanings.sent1: The ginnings of the movie set the tone for the rest of the film.
meanings.sent2: He struggled in the ginnings of the project but eventually found his rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The ginnings of a meal are usually the most appetizing.
meanings.sent4: In the ginnings of a song, the melody captures your attention.
meanings.sent5: The ginnings of a book can determine if you'll keep reading.

meanings.definition: The process of separating cotton fibers from seeds.
meanings.sent1: The ginnings of the cotton industry revolutionized textile production.
meanings.sent2: Farmers used to spend hours on the ginnings of cotton before modern machines.
meanings.sent3: The ginnings of cotton can be a dusty and tiring job.
meanings.sent4: In the ginnings of cotton processing, efficiency is key.
meanings.sent5: The ginnings of cotton require specialized equipment.
